sentences.en: Despite the heat, he'd swapped his overalls for a suit and tie.
sentences.cn: 尽管很热，他还是脱掉工作服换上了西装和领带。

sentences.en: He fidgeted with his tie.
sentences.cn: 他摆弄着领带。

sentences.en: he said he had a business deal to tie up.
sentences.cn: 他说他有一桩生意要处理。

sentences.en: He tied the ends of the plastic bag together.
sentences.cn: 他把塑料袋的两头系在一起。

sentences.en: He was a big man, smartly dressed in a suit and tie.
sentences.cn: 他身材高大，穿着西服打着领带，非常帅气。

sentences.en: He wore a T-shirt that had been tie-dyed in bright colours.
sentences.cn: 他身穿一件颜色鲜艳的扎染的T恤。

sentences.en: her husband is able to &B{tie in} his shifts &B{with} hers at the hospital.
sentences.cn: 她丈夫能够使自己的轮班与她在医院的轮班协调一致。

sentences.en: I bought a great tie-dyed silk scarf.
sentences.cn: 我买了条非常好的扎染丝巾。

sentences.en: I can't find any tie between her and the town.
sentences.cn: 我一点也看不出她和那个小镇有什么联系。

sentences.en: I felt out of place in my suit and tie.
sentences.cn: 我穿着西服、打着领带感觉十分别扭。

sentences.en: I tie my hair back when I’m jogging.
sentences.cn: 我慢跑时把头发扎在脑后。

sentences.en: I wear a shirt and tie at work.
sentences.cn: 我上班穿衬衫打领带。

sentences.en: Interest rates are tied to the rate of inflation.
sentences.cn: 利率和通货膨胀率紧密联系在一起。

sentences.en: Jason had taken off his jacket and loosened his tie.
sentences.cn: 贾森已经脱下夹克，松开了领带。

sentences.en: Most of the guests will be wearing black tie.
sentences.cn: 大多数客人都会穿晚礼服。

sentences.en: Of course, the old school tie has been a help.
sentences.cn: 校友关系当然是帮了忙的。

sentences.en: robbers tied her up and ransacked her home.
sentences.cn: 强盗们把她捆起来后洗劫了她的家。

sentences.en: she didn't want to be tied down by a full-time job.
sentences.cn: 她不想受全职工作的约束。

sentences.en: she may have developed ideas which don't necessarily &B{tie in with} mine.
sentences.cn: 她可能已有自己的想法，不一定要和我的一致。

sentences.en: She was tied up in a meeting all morning. The phone was tied up for an hour.
sentences.cn: 她整个上午都在开会。电话忙了一个小时

sentences.en: The accident tied up traffic.
sentences.cn: 事故阻塞了交通

sentences.en: The Danes won that UEFA tie in a shoot-out.
sentences.cn: 丹麦人在点球大战中胜出，赢下了那场欧洲杯淘汰赛。

sentences.en: The flat is tied to the job.
sentences.cn: 这套公寓是为这个职位配的。

sentences.en: The ship was permitted to tie up in Bos-ton harbour.
sentences.cn: 该船获准在波士顿港口停泊。

sentences.en: Tie it with fabric bows that co-ordinate with other furnishings.
sentences.cn: 系上与其他装饰相配的布质蝴蝶结。

sentences.en: tied up her cash in long-term investments.
sentences.cn: 她把现金都投入到长期投资里

sentences.en: tied up her cash in long-term investments.
sentences.cn: 她把现金都投入到长期投资里

sentences.en: two events that do not tie in; tying the movie promotion in with the book sales.
sentences.cn: 这两件事无法协调；把影片宣传与作品销售联系起来

sentences.en: We'd agreed from the beginning not to tie each other down.
sentences.cn: 我们一开始就说好了不会互相束缚.

sentences.en: Would you go and tie your horse up please.
sentences.cn: 能不能请你去把你的马拴好？

words.tran_cn: 系（tie的过去式和过去分词）
领带；平局；鞋带；领结；不分胜负
打结；不分胜负；被用带（或绳子等）系住

phrases.tran_cn: n. 黑色领结；男子之半正式礼服
（英国公学的）母校领带；校友间的互助之情
n. [建]系杆；领带夹（等于tie clasp）；[铁路]尖轨连接杆
使结合成一整体：使具有密切或有效的关系；联系或协调
喝醉：变得醉的；参加畅饮狂欢
[机]球接头；转向横拉杆球铰接头
（使）配合得当，（使）协调；（与…）相一致
不动用（资金）：把（资金）用于某方面以使之无法挪作它用
n. 小白领结；全套男式晚礼服

trans.tran_cn: 领带，绳子，金属丝，联系，束缚，轨枕，淘汰赛
trans.tran_en: a long narrow piece of cloth tied in a knot around the neck, worn by men

trans.tran_cn: 系，扣，捆，打结，（使）关系密切，束缚，限制，打成平局
trans.tran_en: if two players, teams etc tie or are tied in a game or competition, they finish it with an equal number of points

trans.tran_cn: 拴，扎，捆；把…打结，系上；连接，使有关联
